logs.title: Jan 8 - STAT, INV, DATA Modules
entries: [0001] Completed STAT module: clickable tabs, CRT scanlines, flicker, fully commented.
[0002] Built INV module: file-browser style inventory with comments for clarity.
[0003] Structured DATA module: logs and quests system, backend-ready.
[0004] Discussed RADIO module: drafted UI and planned functionality.
[0005] Decided portfolio approach: GitHub hosting, local-first, desktop dev before Pi deployment.

logs.title: Jan 9 - Quests & Dev Logs
entries: [0000] NEXT: Fix quests loading and add interactive checkboxes.
[0001] Created project folder structure for GitHub: web, backend, data, rpi, docs.
[0002] Added README.md files for root, backend, data, rpi, and docs folders.
[0003] Added small Pip-Boy-style logs for dev tracking.
[0004] Created QUEST system representing remaining build tasks.
[0005] Implemented QUEST UI: dynamic rendering, checkboxes, visual completed state.
[0006] Explained local server requirement; fetch() method clarified.
[0007] Confirmed local website approach preserves Pip-Boy immersion.
[0008] Checked folder structure: discovered quests are in their own folder.
[0009] Updated quests.js to attempt correct path (still not loading).
[0010] Confirmed local server is required for fetch() to work.
[0011] Decided to stop for the day and resume tomorrow.
